letters.author: Fr Londono
quotes: in recognition and gratitude to Mr. Frank Bonack who was in our parishes this past weekend
It was a blessing to have him in this beautiful ministry
I do recommend Mr. Bonack who has so much love for the church

letters.author: Rev Fr Manny Ediza
quotes: I find it very helpful personally because I am always busy and have no time to pray the Holy Rosary daily
with the Living Rosary that Frank and Trudy have set up in my parish I can now do it easily
puts me in solidarity with the hundreds of thousands of people in praying the Holy Rosary
Frank and Trudy were able to register more than 400 parishioners for the Living Rosary
I feel connected with other Catholics throughout the world.
Frank and Trudy are very committed, wonderful and very spiritual

letters.author: Rev Gerard Willger
quotes: The parishioners and other attendants really appreciated the Living Rosary devotion.
an opportunity to grow in their spritiual lives
They felt connected with others throughout the world while praying this beautiful devotion
